languages.text: Gain +1 deflection per stack. Lose all stacks upon taking damage.

traits.locale_text: Gain +1 deflection per stack. Lose all stacks upon taking damage.

languages.text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.
languages.original_text: Gain +1 deflection per stack. Lose all stacks upon taking damage.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

languages.text:
使用者はこの効果のスタックごとに +1 の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得る。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神{/g}以外のダメージを受けた場合、すべてのスタックが消失する。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
使用者はこの効果のスタックごとに +1 の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得る。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神{/g}以外のダメージを受けた場合、すべてのスタックが消失する。

languages.text: Персонаж получает по 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждый уровень этого эффекта. Когда персонаж получает урон любого типа, кроме {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}, все уровни сбрасываются.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает по 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждый уровень этого эффекта. Когда персонаж получает урон любого типа, кроме {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}, все уровни сбрасываются.

Персонаж получает по 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждый уровень этого эффекта. Когда персонаж получает урон любого типа, кроме {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}, все уровни сбрасываются.

Персонаж получает по 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} за каждый уровень этого эффекта. Когда персонаж получает урон любого типа, кроме {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}, все уровни сбрасываются.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}. Erleidet der Träger Schaden (mit Ausnahme von {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direktem{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}), werden alle Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}. Erleidet der Träger Schaden (mit Ausnahme von {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direktem{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}), werden alle Stapel entfernt.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bu etkinin her birikimi için +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanır. Giyen kişi; {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} hariç herhangi bir hasar türüne maruz kaldığında tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, bu etkinin her birikimi için +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanır. Giyen kişi; {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} hariç herhangi bir hasar türüne maruz kaldığında tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Le porteur gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} pour chaque cumul de cet effet. Lorsque le porter subit n'importe quel type de dégâts, hormis des dégâts {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}directs{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mentaux{/g} ou du {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g}, tous les cumuls sont retirés.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Le porteur gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} pour chaque cumul de cet effet. Lorsque le porter subit n'importe quel type de dégâts, hormis des dégâts {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}directs{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mentaux{/g} ou du {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp{/g}, tous les cumuls sont retirés.

languages.text: El portador gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada acumulación de este efecto. Cuando el portador sufra cualquier tipo de daño que no sea {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}directo{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}disformidad{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, todas las acumulaciones se pierden.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: El portador gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada acumulación de este efecto. Cuando el portador sufra cualquier tipo de daño que no sea {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}directo{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}disformidad{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, todas las acumulaciones se pierden.

languages.text: 装备者每有一层此效果，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点。当装备者承受任意类型伤害时（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}除外），移除所有层数。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each stack of this effect. When the wearer suffers any type of damage, except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental{/g}, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每有一层此效果，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点。当装备者承受任意类型伤害时（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}除外），移除所有层数。
